oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bovine Viral Diarrhea Virus: Genetic Analysis and Signalment of Persistently Infected Dairy Calves Detected in the Upper Midwestern United States
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schefers, J. M.
Collins, J. E.
Goyal, S. M.
Ames, T. R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: PI dairy cattle
gestation
viral RNA
genotype
BVDV
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this study was to detect and confirm PI dairy cattle, research the dam's location during the first trimester of gestation, and genetically sequence a portion of the 5' untranslated (UTR) region of viral RNA to determine the prevalence of different genotypes of BVDV PI dairy cattle in the upper midwestern United States.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2010; 220
